TopicTitle: KSP crash when specific ship loaded

Articles.Content:
Hello guys,

I have a problem with KSP where it causes an access violation when I load a certain ship, the go back to the space center: this is when it crashes. I need help. I know that the Basic Fins I put are bugged and they clip through my ship and this is maybe why it crashes. The game also crashes even when I loaded another ship but not systematically each time I go back to the space center. I have attached a log file so you can sort this out helpfully.

Dropbox link: https://www.dropbox.com/sh/k4wxiwk1o1m345w/AADuqmBkNA7UPOQf3Qm_4Z98a?dl=0

Thanks in advance

What is the craft size of your ship? (I.E. bytes, KB, ect) If it's 0, then that's your problems.

It's been my problem a few times.
